definition: to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
to forward (a shipment)/to reprint sth published elsewhere/Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 zai4]

sentences.english: Eventually, a man drove us in his own car to safety.
sentences.chinese: 最後，一名男子開車把我們載到安全之地。

sentences.english: A file system must be unmounted to be reformatted.
sentences.chinese: 一個文件系統必須在被缷載後纔可以重新格式化。

sentences.english: The German Emperor took revenge on China by making thinas difficult in the ceremony and propriety.
sentences.chinese: 出於報復心理，德皇在禮儀問題上刁難載灃使團。

sentences.english: Can you give me a lift to the next town? ;
sentences.chinese: 可以順道載我到下一個鎮嗎？

sentences.english: Invitro release of naltrexone microspheres prepared with the various PLGA were compared.
sentences.chinese: 以其爲載體制備納曲酮微球，比較了體外釋藥速率。

sentences.english: Little resistance during operation, capable of starting onload and conveying material at high speed.
sentences.chinese: 運行阻力小，能有載啓動，可高速輸送物料。

sentences.english: The book describes the artistic life of Beiqu (operas popular in the North of China) actors at that time.
sentences.chinese: 這本書記載了當時北曲演員的藝術活動。

sentences.english: It was the largest temple in the whole country, and the emperor told his men to take me there.
sentences.chinese: 那是全國最大的廟，皇帝叫他的屬下把我載到那裏。

sentences.english: Compendium of Materia Medica recorded 9 kinds of medical amphibians can be used as medicine.
sentences.chinese: 明代李時珍《本草綱目》一書記載藥用兩棲類9種。

sentences.english: He needed a  forklift truck to carry it to the official weighing.
sentences.chinese: 他需要用剷車把這顆南瓜載到官方稱重地點稱重。

sentences.english: It's too serious. Who drive you here?
sentences.chinese: 這麼嚴重，是誰載你來的？

sentences.english: Here’s $500. Please take this group of
sentences.chinese: 這裏有五百元，請馬上載這些企鵝去動物園。

sentences.english: The balloon-borne radars can virtually act as AWACS themselves, an Air Force official said.
sentences.chinese: 空軍官員說，氣球載雷達能夠扮演預警機本身的角色。

sentences.english: You see three people on a motorcycle and figure there's room for two more.
sentences.chinese: 看到三人共騎機車，會認爲還可以載兩個人。

sentences.english: There were opals and sapphires, the former in cups of crystal, and the latter in cups of jade.
sentences.chinese: 水晶杯裏盛着蛋白石，碧玉杯裏載着藍寶石。

sentences.english: Maybe you can get a lift with Dick and Mildred.
sentences.chinese: 或許你可以讓迪克和米爾德里德載你一程啊。

definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
